attributes.action: sack the prosecutor and judge who called a 13  year old abuse victim predatory
attributes.additional_details:
Sack the prosecutor Robert Colover and the judge  Nigel Peters . Colover described a 13 year old child who was the victim of a paedophile as "Predatory in all her actions and she is sexually experienced." Judge Peters went on to say to the abuser "The girl was predatory and was egging you on." He then went on to impose an 8 month suspended sentence on paedophile Neil Wilson, 41.
Our children need protecting from these people.
